purchasePlan.title: Purchase Plan
purchasePlan.choiceLotteries.AllActiveLo: All lotteries active at the same time
purchasePlan.buy.buyConfirmPopup.content: The purchase of the plan has been successfully completed.
purchasePlan.intro.text1: WinChecker is the solution for controlling your predictions regarding all major National and Pan-European lotteries.
purchasePlan.intro.text2: But that's not all, WinChecker offers a lot of interesting features; you can choose between four plans, Basic Naz, Basic Pan, Premium Silver and Premium Gold. Each plan has different characteristics. Choose the one that best suits your needs.
purchasePlan.intro.text6: The Premium Gold plan, the most chosen by our users, includes all the lotteries at the same time. To find out which lotteries can be activated in each plan, go to the next step.
purchasePlan.intro.textApple: Buying a plan on WinChecker gives you the right to use the features provided by the chosen plan, based on the lotteries you decide to activate. The purchased service is recurring and is automatically renewed on an annual basis. Once you have purchased the plan, you can manage your subscription at any time from iTunes or the Apple Store.
wincheckerIntro.text: Tired of checking your lottery tickets manually after each draw, even if you play the same numbers all the time? From now on WinChecker will save you work and time by checking your lottery tickets for the most famous national and foreign lotteries in the world.
